name: Are there three groups of triple balls in the central band of the crown?

children.name: Does the bottom of the shield intersect evenly with the cross below?
Does the shield appear more rectangular with edges, or curved along the bottom?
Are there clearly visible initials underneath the shield?
Do the initials contain the letters “P” and “V”?
Does the shield touch both the immediate outer chain lines?
Is the center petal of the crown’s fleur-de-lis evenly curved?
Does the shield contain the letter “B”?
Does the central sepal of the crosier touch the bottom of the shield?
Does the neck of the crosier bend towards the curl?
